MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
LENGTH: {property} must be longer than {constraints.0} and lower than {constraints.1}
OPTIONAL: {property} is optional you can skip it.
NUMBER_LENGTH: {property} must be a number with length between {min} - {max}.
PHONENUMBER: {property} must be a valid phone number.
USER_PHONE_EXISTS: User with this phone not exists.
IS_UUID: {property} must be a valid uuid v4
IS_MONGOID: {property} must be a valid mongoDB id.
IsLongitude: {property} must be a valid longitude value.
IsLatitude: {property} must be a valid latitude value.
IsISO31661Alpha2: {property} must be a valid iso2c value like US UK.
